metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6960 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in apng2gif 1.7. There is an integer overflowresulting in a heap-based buffer over-read, related to the load_apngfunction and the imagesize variable.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apng2gif - 1.5-3+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: apng2gif package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5-3+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
